title: idaya vINai udaya gItam
sahitya:
idaya vINai udaya gItam isaippadaik-kELAi udaya gIta 
uNarvil Ongum uNmaiyait-tErAi manamE uLmukham pArAi


anupallavi

  sutantaramAi nirantaramAi shuddha shakti jyOtiyAngE 
sukha naTam shei sUKSmattai ahamaham enrariya nALum


caraNam 1    bhUtamum illai mAttirai illai pori pulanillai karaNamumillai
nAdamum illai vinduvum illai nAn nI avanenum bhEdamum illai
jAtiyum illai samayamum illai sAttiram illai gOttiram illai
vEdamum illai bOdhamum illai vEgamum illai dAhamum illai
    caraNam 2    iru vinai illai mugguNamillai ihaparam illai sukha 
duhkkamillai aruvuruvillai guru shiSyan illai adu nAn 
adu nI aduvE ulagam pudumudu poduvadu punitAnmAvena
